title: Subject based Access Control Entry (ACE) object definition

time-interval.description: The time-interval is an object where each object contains a period and recurrence

period.description: String represents a period using the RFC5545 Period

recurrence.description: String array represents a recurrence rule using the RFC5545 Recurrence

resources.description: References the application's resources to which a security policy applies

validity.description: validity is an array of time-interval objects

subjectuuid.description: The id of the device to which the ace applies to or "*" for anonymous access
